verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%>. From the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H7097>end<s%> to the <S%H3027>coast<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2855>Hethlon<s%>, as one <S%H935>goes<s%> to <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>, <S%H2704>Hazar<s%>â€“enan, the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%>, to the <S%H3027>coast<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>; for these are his <S%H6285>sides<s%> <S%H6921>east<s%> and <S%H3220>west<s%>; <S%H259>a<s%> portion for <S%H1835>Dan<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H259>a<s%> portion for <S%H836>Asher<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> even unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H259>a<s%> portion for <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H259>a<s%> portion for <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H259>a<s%> portion for <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> even unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H259>a<s%> portion for <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H259>a<s%> portion for <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, shall be the <S%H8641>offering<s%> which you shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> of <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> reeds in <S%H7341>breadth<s%>, and in <S%H753>length<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> of the other <S%H2506>parts<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>: and the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> shall be in the midst of <S%H8432>it<s%>.

The <S%H8641>oblation<s%> that you shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall be of <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H753>length<s%>, and of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth<s%>.

And for <S%H3548>them<s%>, even for the priests, shall be this <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>oblation<s%>; toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H3220>length<s%>, and toward the west <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth<s%>, and toward the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth<s%>, and toward the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H753>length<s%>: and the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432>there<s%>.

It shall be for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that are <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok<s%>; which have <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H4931>charge<s%>, which went not <S%H8582>astray<s%> when the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H8582>astray<s%>, as the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> went <S%H8582>astray<s%>.

And this <S%H8642>oblation<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> that is <S%H8641>offered<s%> shall be unto them a thing <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>.

And over <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall have <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H753>length<s%>, and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth<s%>: all the <S%H753>length<s%> shall be <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

And they shall not <S%H4376>sell<s%> of <S%H4171>it<s%>, neither exchange, nor <S%H5674>alienate<s%> the <S%H7225>firstfruits<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>: for it is <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>, that are <S%H3498>left<s%> in the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> over <S%H6440>against<s%> the <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>, shall be a <S%H2455>profane<s%> place for the <S%H5892>city<s%>, for <S%H4186>living<s%>, and for <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>: and the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432>there<s%>.

And these shall be the <S%H4060>measures<s%> <S%H6828>there<s%>; the north <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, and the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, and on the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, and the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

And the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>, and toward the <S%H5045>south<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>, and toward the <S%H6921>east<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>, and toward the <S%H3220>west<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>.

And the <S%H3498>residue<s%> in <S%H753>length<s%> over <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H8641>oblation<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> portion shall be <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6921>eastward<s%>, and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>: and it shall be over <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H8641>oblation<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8393>portion<s%>; and the increase there shall be for <S%H3899>food<s%> unto them that <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>.
And they that <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> it out of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

All the <S%H8641>oblation<s%> shall be <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> by <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>: you shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>oblation<s%> <S%H7243>square<s%>, with the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And the <S%H3498>residue<s%> shall be for the <S%H5387>prince<s%>, on the one side and on the other of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>oblation<s%>, and of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, over <S%H6440>against<s%> the <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> of the <S%H8641>oblation<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%>, and <S%H3220>westward<s%> over <S%H6440>against<s%> the <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> toward the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%>, over <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H2506>portions<s%> for the <S%H5387>prince<s%>: and it shall be the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>oblation<s%>; and the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432>there<s%>.

Moreover from the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and from the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, being in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of that which is the <S%H5387>prince<s%>'s, between the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, shall be for the <S%H5387>prince<s%>.

As for the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> shall have a <S%H259>portion<s%>.

And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> shall have a <S%H259>portion<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> a <S%H259>portion<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> a <S%H259>portion<s%>.
And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> unto the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H1410>Gad<s%> a <S%H259>portion<s%>.

And by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, at the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H8486>southward<s%>, the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall be even from <S%H8559>Tamar<s%> unto the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4808>strife<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%>, and to the <S%H5158>river<s%> toward the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

This is the <S%H776>land<s%> which you shall <S%H5307>divide<s%> by lot unto the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, and these are their <S%H4256>portions<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.

And these are the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H4060>measures<s%>.

And the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be after the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%>; <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>.

And at the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>: and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8179>gates<s%>; and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>.

And at the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H4060>measures<s%>: and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8179>gates<s%>; <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>.

At the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, with their <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8179>gates<s%>; <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>.

It was round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8034>measures<s%>: and the name of the <S%H5892>city<s%> from that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H3074>be<s%>, The Lord is there.
